properties.name: Anping Fort 安平古堡
properties.description: Posted by Mort 安平古堡是台灣歷史最悠久的城堡，最初的安平古堡是荷蘭人建造的熱蘭遮城，又稱奧倫治城，城分內城和外城，內城3層；有長官公署、瞭望台、教堂、士兵營房，並高懸荷蘭國旗，是行政的核心所在。1873年英國軍艦船砲命中城內軍火庫引發爆炸，城牆炸毀，之後變成廢墟。 磚石一度成為居民修築房舍、清廷建造億載金城的建材。日據時代，原有的城垣被剷平， 改建成今日所見的日式海關宿舍與紅磚平台，荷式城堡的樣子已經看不出來了。 This place is the fortress that the Hollander sets up in 1624. There are a lot of ancient old historic relics in neighborhood and have a lot of delicious foods.

properties.name: Bank of Taiwan's old dormitory 北投臺灣銀行舊宿舍
properties.description: Posted by Mort

properties.name: Beautiful octagon tower  淡江八角塔
properties.description: Posted by MortDan river middle schoolThe Dan river middle school organized in 1914 originally is the presbyterian church raises missionary\'s missionary school. Usually, the school not open tourist visits. In the school the scenery is exquisite, has the fresh water female school, the horse accompanies the memorial park and eight watchtowers, all extremely has the artistic value and the historical significance.

properties.name: Benshan Fifth Tunnel 山本五坑
properties.description: Posted by MortThe park cooperates with Taiwan Sugar Corp. to renovate the old Benshan Fifth Tunnel to provide the tourists with real-life experience in the tunnel. The tunnel contains exhibits of wax figures to demonstrate the mining process.

properties.name: British consul official residence  英國領事官邸
properties.description: Posted by MortInvited a British architect design at that time, yard full planted a rose, the guest, restaurant in the official residence and main bedroom inside all established fireplace.

properties.name: Changhua Confucian temple 彰化孔廟
properties.description: Posted by MortConfucian temple彰化孔子廟 1726年，聘請大陸漳州、泉州、潮州師父，由大陸將建築材料船運來台，創建彰化孔子廟。 現存之彰化孔子廟，僅留原規模之三分之二左右。 Changhua Confucian temple In 1726 constructed.

properties.name: Chiayi Jinja 嘉義神社
properties.description: Posted by Mort  Chiayi Shrine嘉義神社 創建於大正 4年（1915）, 光復後改為忠烈祠,於1994年因火災全毀,原址於1998年改建為「射日塔」，原有神社配置格局保存相當完整。 照片裡面的是社務所兩間房子中間有走道連接，裡面的感覺很舒服... Jinja of the Japanese construction in Taiwan.

properties.name: Chiayi train station 嘉義車站
properties.description: Posted by MortChiayi train stationIn the past station set up by Japanese, the appearance of the building was more western.

properties.name: Chihkan Tower 赤崁樓
properties.description: Posted by Mort17世紀荷蘭人來台為防止暴動，便修築普羅民西亞[Provintia]城城堡，Provintia 荷文為永恆之意。建築高為10公尺半以糖水、糯汁攪拌貝殼灰，糊紅磚砌成，為四方形的城堡，在東北與西南角各有兩座凸出的菱堡。 咸豐年間在城堡舊址上開始出現中國式的樓閣建築。官府再把殘城高度鑿切一半，回填台基，建起「海神廟」，現在的赤崁樓呈現的則是，荷式城堡遺跡與清式樓閣建築共存。 It is the city that the Hollander sets up originally here.Start afterwards on the original city constructing a Chinese type building.

properties.name: Chinese herb store 乾元蔘藥行
properties.description: Posted by Mort  臺北市 迪化街[永樂町] 迪化街裡的裝飾藝術風格建築 過年的時候非常熱鬧。 Art Deco style building.

properties.name: Cishan Station 旗山車站
properties.description: Posted by MortCishan Station很可愛的小車站，希望能快點整修好。 The building of the station is lovely. However it has already stopped using. The station is renovating now.

properties.name: Confucius Temple 台南孔廟
properties.description: Posted by Mort台南孔廟位在臺南市中區南門路二號，佔地約9000餘平方公尺，建築物有15棟，共19間，是台灣的孔廟中建築物最多的，也是一個最具代表性的閩南式建築。 Confucian temple in Tainan is a Confucian temple that whole Taiwan built up at the earliest stage.

properties.name: Crown Prince Chalet 金瓜石太子賓館
properties.description: Posted by Mort典型的日式高級建築樣式 The building was designed based on the Japanese imperial palace, and is the most characteristic building among all the existing ancient Japanese buildings in Taiwan . The chalet is designed with a beautiful garden, an archery field in the backyard, and a mini golf course. The visitors can experience the graceful life of the Japanese royal court.

properties.name: Dan-Tsu Noodles restaurant 赤崁擔仔麵
properties.description: Posted by Mort 店是開在老房子裡所以氣氛不錯,在赤崁樓旁邊很容易就找到 There is the tradition food in Tainan in this restaurant. The building of the restaurant also special. Have meal there can feel history of Tainan.

properties.name: Drinking water museum 自來水博物館
properties.description: Posted by Mort  Drinking water museum 自來水博物館1908建，國內首座自來水博物館。 Originally is pulls out the original water, the water distribution place. Now becomes the drinking water museum.

properties.name: Embroidered satin shoe store 小花園繡花鞋
properties.description: Posted by Mort這家繡花鞋店有將近70年的歷史，1949年從上海搬來台灣，光顧小花園的客層從18歲到80歲都有，是台北市政府認證的百年老店。 This store has sold the shoes that traditional Chinese lady wears

properties.name: Fort San Domingo 淡水紅毛城
properties.description: Posted by Mort西班牙人在淡水河口邊山丘上興建的聖多明哥城，主堡牆壁非常厚，約近二公尺，算是外國人在台灣留下的建築中比較完整的堡壘建築吧！ The Fort that the Spanish constructs in Taiwan.The Hollander, British of passing by builds and becomes continuously. [Here have a lot of dragonflies to fly in the sky. ]

properties.name: Fountain 北投公園噴水池
properties.description: Posted by MortThere are a lot of fountains in the park.

properties.name: Gueide St. 貴德街
properties.description: Posted by Mort[港町] There is port in this neighborhood traded before very prosperous, had a lot of Occidentalism buildings. However all coulded not see mostly now. This house is a minority to stay complete house now.

properties.name: Hai-an Rd. 海安路
properties.description: Posted by MortThere is ancient street in Tainan here.

properties.name: High tower area 華山高塔區
properties.description: Posted by MortHuashan Culture Park品控、化驗室、試驗室主任室及研究

properties.name: Hongmao Harbor 紅毛港
properties.description: Posted by Mort約三百多年前就有人在紅毛港從事漁業逐漸定居下來，是一個老聚落。新的建築感覺很單純。以後聚落會被拆除成為高雄港的貨櫃中心，會保留局部，不過保留的範圍很小舊聚落的氣氛也少了很多。 About more than 300 years ago people settled down down gradually in the Hongmao Harbor fishing. It is an old village here. The building of the village here still maintains old appearance, both the street sides are all old houses.Here will be become one part of Kaohsiung harbor hereafter.

properties.name: Hot springs museum 北投溫泉博物館
properties.description: Posted by Mort   溫泉博物館１９１３年台北州廳興建的北投溫泉浴場。溫泉浴池環繞著拱形石柱與彩繪玻璃窗，占地七百坪，一樓磚造二樓木造，為當時最富盛名、規模最大的公共浴場。 This building is the hot springs public bath field that built in 1913. Now here becomes hot springs museum.

properties.name: Jhongshan Bridge	中山橋
properties.description: Posted by MortJhongshan Bridge This bridge was already 70 years. This bridge has already been moved conservancy currently.

properties.name: Jhongshan Christ presbyterian church 中山基督長老教會
properties.description: Posted by MortJhongshan Christ presbyterian church中山基督長老教會 Is located the Taipei urban district the gothic style protestantism church

properties.name: Jingtong St. 菁桐老街
properties.description: Posted by Mort菁桐故事館外的腳踏車

properties.name: Jingtong Station 菁桐車站
properties.description: Posted by Mort平溪線裡保存的很好的車站 孤戀花拍攝的場景之一

properties.name: Kaohsiung train station 舊高雄火車站
properties.description: Posted by MortKaohsiung train station舊高雄火車站，濃厚日式風格的車站 日本人蓋的七大火車站之一 Japanese imperial palace construction habitually using model. Constructed to in 1941 Now this construction retains into the train station museum

properties.name: Kiln of making bricks 打狗煉瓦工場
properties.description: Posted by Mort台灣煉瓦會社打狗工場[中都唐榮磚窯廠] 裡面有一座八卦窯和兩支大煙囪 Kiln of making bricks

properties.name: Lintian Mountain 林田山林業文化園區
properties.description: Posted by Mort 林田山原本是一座個有著溫泉旅館的小小山村，在1926年日本人興建林田山鐵路，成為台灣重要伐木林場後，被日本人稱為摩里沙卡，成為一座重要伐木林場，到了國府接收後，繼續伐木事業，到了1960年代，山上更聚集二千多人，遠比山下小鎮更為熱鬧，但是和其它伐木山城一樣，林田山伐木結束後，開始一段漫長的荒村歲月，居民大量搬遷，房舍漸漸坍毀，沒有多少人記得林田山。 最近幾年，林田山十分風光，成為花東地區的旅遊重鎮，居民也思考從生態旅遊角度，開創林田山的另一個高峰，讓林田山在社區發展上，成為一種標竿，吸引許多遊客與社區團隊前往拜訪。 但是，居民開創出林田山的繁華之後，實際並未讓當地居民走向永續，卻讓他們面臨被迫辦遷的命運，最近一紙整理國有財產的公文，切割開居民與土地的關係，讓居民恐慌，他們心中依戀的故鄉，其實是國有財產的宿舍，無論居住多久，為這塊土地努力多少，他們永遠寄人籬下，他們是一群沒有未來的人。 林田山在沒落中走向興盛，居民努力的心血，國家全數收割，將生活社區改為遊樂園區，甚至守了數十年的老房子，一夕拆除重建，就以促進觀光發展的名義，讓一個古老社區成為新穎遊樂地。 ●本文轉載自公共電視台「我們的島」節目

properties.name: Liu's house 柳營劉宅
properties.description: Posted by Mort 位於台南縣柳營鄉中山西路是台灣畫家劉啟祥故宅，房子還沒整修還維持著舊舊的感覺，漫漂亮的，現在只開放一樓。 這座洋樓西側，還有多座三合院，都是劉氏家族所有；院前有大埕，是附近的大地主。 現在裡面有開咖啡店 Here Was a painter\'s house before, the neighborhood also had some ancient house.

properties.name: Lukang Folk Arts Museum 鹿港民俗文物館
properties.description: Posted by Mort  Lukang Folk Arts MuseumThis museum is the house of the originally local businessman. This constructs equal pomp.

properties.name: MOCA Taipei 台北當代藝術館
properties.description: Posted by Mort  MOCA Taipei當代藝術館原本是日本人蓋的建成小學，後來曾經作為台北市政府使用，現在是當代藝術館，是一棟兩層樓的建築有斜屋頂和小鐘樓，空間不是非常大但是展覽的內容都很有趣，在台北比較喜歡的一間博物館 This is a contemporary art museum. The museum\'s building is a municipal historic site. Today its hybrid blend of Euro-influenced architectural appearance and structure is imbued with aspects from the Japanese colonial period making the building a unique locus. One of my most favorite museums.

properties.name: Military Housing 憲光六村的路燈
properties.description: Posted by Mort 眷村角落裡還有著像飛碟一樣的舊路燈，舊舊的牆、舊舊的路燈還有長長的小巷子，拍起照來變得很有感覺。 There are the old street lamp and old wall and the history trace here so I took some photographs here.

properties.name: Mineral industry company guest house 菁桐太子賓館
properties.description: Posted by Mort台陽礦業株式會社俱樂部，有212坪[很大...]，保存蠻完整的日式建築，很值得進去看。 孤戀花拍攝的場景之一，裡面放了一張孤戀花的海報，不過裡面不能拍照。 附近有很多的蜻蜓跟蝴蝶[到處飛...] 那兩張是豆娘[短腹幽蟌Euphaua formosa Hagan] This is a very beautiful Japanese house, can see a lot of dragonflies here.

properties.name: NTU 台灣大學
properties.description: Posted by MortNational Taiwan University台大和一些美麗的角落 The predecessor of National Taiwan University was Taihoku (Taipei) Imperial University, founded by the Japanese in 1928.

properties.name: National Museum of Taiwanese Literature 台灣文學館
properties.description: Posted by Mort  National Museum of Taiwanese Literature原台南市政府舊大樓修護而成 Museum of Taiwanese Literature. In the past was the Tainan municipal government which the Japanese constructed.

properties.name: Old Hospital of Army 日軍台南衛戍病院
properties.description: Posted by Mort 這裡是日治時期日軍在台灣設立的軍醫院，戰後成立八O四醫院，近年醫院遷離，成功大學爭取成為力行校區，整修後將有系所遷入。 曾經是醫院又有一段時間沒使用，裡面還是有點恐怖，倒是很適合拍照的地方。 It was a military hospital built by the Japanese Army during the Japanese Colonization.

properties.name: Old Tainan Theological Seminary and Church 台南神學院
properties.description: Posted by Mort台南神學院

properties.name: Old Union Hall 台南公會堂 吳園
properties.description: Posted by Mort分為公會堂.吳園.柳屋料理三部份 原為清道光年間地方士紳所建之吳園， 內有亭台樓閣、假山、池塘等 現在還剩下局部的園林

properties.name: ROSARY CATHDRAL 高雄玫瑰聖母堂
properties.description: Posted by Mort台灣第一座天主教堂 The first cathedral in Taiwan.

properties.name: SPOT-Taipei Film House 光點台北
properties.description: Posted by Mort   SPOT-Taipei Film House前美國大使館，中美斷交荒廢多年後整修成為光點電影院並有誠品和咖啡館在裡面，在這裡可以看到一些比較特別的電影 SPOT-Taipei Film House, Operate by Taiwan Film and Culture Society, is officially opened on November 10th, 2002. " SPOT-Taipei Film House" is formerly the residency of the U.S. Anmbassador, now a historical landmark after the restoration sponsored by the TSMC Education & Culture Foundation. SPOT is now managed by the internationally acclaimed director Hou Hsiao-hsien and his staff, aimed to establish a film oriented complex, to serve as an interactive window of cross-culture exchange for the creative industry. Spot not only provides the finest movie with more culture diversity, but also creates a channel for filmmakers and the movie lover to exchange ideas, and to generate various possible thinking through the conference and the workshop. A multi-functional building was composed: Spot Cinema- screening the fine-selected movies from all over the world, Eslite Bookstore, C25 Coffee Shop, the exhibition gallery, the multi-media conference room, and the SixthAvenue- the finest winery lounge. Address: 18, Sec. 2, Zhongshan N. Road, Taipei

properties.name: Sansia Bridge 三峽橋
properties.description: Posted by MortSansia Bridge

properties.name: Sansia Old Street 三峽老街
properties.description: Posted by Mort是三峽早期的市集中心，街道兩旁商店林立，保留了完整日據時代以來的商業街屋 The street both sides contain a lot of stores, can see ancient street here.

properties.name: Shihfen St. 十分老街
properties.description: Posted by Mort火車就走在老街中間，路邊好多貓咪跟蜻蜓 [戀戀風塵海報中拍攝的地方]

properties.name: Shuci Rd. 九份豎崎路
properties.description: Posted by Mort很特別的路，但是新的房子越蓋越多快要把原本九份的特色都蓋掉了 Was the place that extracts gold before here, have ever been a prosperous small town. Be filled with the romantic feeling of the past

properties.name: Songshan Tobacco factory 松山菸廠
properties.description: Posted by MortTaipei Songshan Tobacco factory 松山菸廠日據時期「台灣總督府專賣局松山煙草工場」，光復後由專賣局接收成為松山菸廠，專製捲菸、菸絲及雪茄等菸草製品。工廠內設置員工宿舍、醫護室、育嬰室，重視員工福利。建築風格屬現代主義，建材都是特別定製的，做工精細。菸廠入口辦公廳為行政管理，後方是6,000坪的製菸工場，有製盒、理葉、切葉、捲菸、包裝等生產部門。目前已指定辦公廳、製菸工場、鍋爐房、1至5號倉庫為古蹟本體，並將蓮花池、運輸軌道及光復後新建倉庫，一併納為古蹟保存範圍。該廠是公賣局4大菸廠〈屏東內埔、台北、豐原、松山〉中最大的廠。松山菸廠早期產品品牌為香蕉、新樂園、雙喜等，現在則生產長壽、福祿、總00統、寶島、金龍等品牌。 看到過去松山菸廠的產品新樂園菸箱子，就把它拍了下來 The Japanese constructs tobacco factory. The construction style is the modernism. In the factory has the quadrangle garden and the basin. Is a modernized large-scale system tobacco factory. In the factory plants massively plants plants, the landscape is exquisite

properties.name: Tainan train station 台南車站
properties.description: Posted by MortTainan train station日本人蓋的七大火車站之一 二樓原為鐵道飯店 Tainan train station This is the western station that the past Japanese constructs in Taiwan.

properties.name: Tait & Co.  德記洋行
properties.description: Posted by Mort  Tait & Co hong 位於台南市安平的三級古蹟原英商德記洋行，在一百多年後可望由台南市府委託德記洋行股份有限公司再次經營。 Tait & Co. was founded in 1867 (Tongtze 6th Year, Ching Dynasty) in Haitoushe, Anping, trading opium, camphor and sugar. After Taiwan was ceded to Japan in 1895 (Guangsui 21st Year, Ching Dynasty), the sale of opium and camphor became a government franchise, and the number of foreign companies decreased. Moreover, as Anping Port was silted up and affected the normal operations of local waterways, many foreign companies were closed, except Tait & Company. The office of Tait & Co. is 200 feet long and 120 feet wide. Together with the Bain & Co., Bovd & Co., Julius Mannich & Co., and Wright & Co., they were known as the top five foreign companies in Anping. As they were built in Western style, they looked different from local buildings in traditional Fujian style. Moreover, they are the witnesses of foreign trade in Taiwan. No.194, Anbei Rd., Anping District, Tainan City 708, Taiwan (R.O.C.)

properties.name: Tamsui Church 淡水教堂
properties.description: Posted by MortTamsui Church淡水教堂 Gothic style construction church

properties.name: Tamsui customs official mansion 淡水小白宮
properties.description: Posted by MortTamsui customs official mansion建於西元1866年 清代海關官邸，西班牙白堊迴廊式建築 Spanish chalk winding corridor type construction. Constructed to in 1866 The construction outward appearance arches the porch pillar.

properties.name: The British Consulate 打狗英國領事館
properties.description: Posted by Mort The British ConsulateIn 1864 the British moved consulate from Tamsui to Kaohsiung. Japanese viceroy the wall of consulate building with white cement to avoid bomb attack from US air force during the 2nd world war. Kaohsiung city government commissioned Professor Li Chien - Lang to repair the consulate building as a museum to store historic documents and cultural products. More photos ↙ http://www.wretch.cc/album/album.php?id=wrsfxv37&book=9

properties.name: The Lin family garden 板橋林家花園
properties.description: Posted by Mort   板橋林本源園邸 目前台灣僅存最完整的園林建築，和台南吳園、新竹北郭園、霧峰萊園並稱「台灣四大名園」。 Taiwanese keep the most complete garden building currently. Be filled with a beautiful Chinese building in garden.

properties.name: The Temple of the Sansha 三峽祖師廟
properties.description: Posted by Mort民國三十六年由藝術家李梅樹規劃重建，親自設計，尋找師傅。 現在仍持續整建之中，因為要求嚴謹，成為雕刻最精美之廟宇。 【柱子上有一百隻不同的鳥！】 This is a temple that has an elegant carvings. 【The stone pillar in the picture contain 100 different birds!】 This is a temple which has a lot of carvingses.

properties.name: The coal mine processing field 菁桐洗礦場
properties.description: Posted by Mort

properties.name: Tongsiao Jinja 通霄神社
properties.description: Posted by Mort

properties.name: Treasurehill 寶藏巖
properties.description: Posted by Mort新店溪邊的寶藏巖山坡上的老違建聚落 ，2006年，《紐約時報》將寶藏巖納入台北最具特色的景點之一，和101並列台北最直得觀賞的景點之一

properties.name: Yanping St. 安平老街
properties.description: Posted by Mort又稱臺灣街是台灣本島的第一條商店街，有蝦餅、餛飩、蝦捲、蝦仁煎、棺材板...很多小吃

properties.name: shanping theater  昇平戲院
properties.description: Posted by Mort  [昇平座]北台灣第一家戲院，每逢戲院入場或散場時，豎崎 路石階上的木屐聲此起彼落、不絕於耳，廣場上人聲嘈雜，通宵達旦， 1986年停業。 Here is a Well-known theater in the past. Have already closed up shop in 1986.

properties.name: suspension  bridges 靜安吊橋
properties.description: Posted by Mort

properties.name: temple bell tower 東和禪寺鐘樓
properties.description: Posted by Morttemple bell tower東和禪寺鐘樓 是水泥仿木構所蓋的鐘樓，廟已經被拆了，現在只剩鐘樓 Constructed in 1908 Japanese construction style

properties.name: 保安車站 Baoan station
properties.description: Posted by Mort可愛的小車站，車站建築使用阿里山檜木和日本黑瓦建成，主結構以榫接方式建造而成完全不使用鐵釘。台鐵於一九九三年宣布永久保存保安車站原貌，目前購票口前的隔欄、候車室的木質長椅都是舊物。 This is an old station. The station still keeps old appearance today.

properties.name: 保安車站鐵路宿舍 Old dormitory
properties.description: Posted by Mort 保安車站鐵路宿舍，宿舍應有八、九十年歷史，以往屬於長官宿舍Old dormitory

properties.name: 半邊井 Ancient well
properties.description: Posted by Mort半邊井其實是完整的一囗井，只是被一道牆隔成兩半。在牆內的一半，是提供給自己人使用的。至於露在牆外面的那一半，則是供給沒有能力鑿井的人自由汲水取用。 This is a well that uses with neighbor together. So the well is been divided into two halfs.

properties.name: 南台南火車站 South Tainan train station
properties.description: Posted by Mort南台南火車站(已停止使用) This train station is already a stop usage. However the building still keeps well.

properties.name: 台南武德殿
properties.description: Posted by Mort台南武德殿現在是忠義國小的禮堂

properties.name: 台南測候所 Meteorology museum
properties.description: Posted by Mort  台南測候所是三個同心圓構成的建物，外圍是十八邊形，設有十八扇窗戶，裡面有陳列早年的地震儀、無線發報器和一些氣象的舊文件。 白色的塔裡有旋轉樓梯上去，很可愛的房子。 Shape very special building. The past is the place that uses to prognosticate the meteorology earthquake here.

properties.name: 台南監獄 Tainan jail
properties.description: Posted by MortThis is one part of old jail. There are a lot of dragonflies here.

properties.name: 國家廣播文物館 National Radio Museum
properties.description: Posted by Mort  日據時代這裡是「民雄放送所」，民國三十四年改名為「台灣廣播電台民雄播送機室」。於民國八十八年元月開館對外開放參觀。Here was a broadcasting station now becomes broadcasts museum. The museum to have very many ancient machines.

properties.name: 國家廣播文物館 日式招待所 Radio Taiwan International Houseparent
properties.description: Posted by MortThis is an attractive house.

properties.name: 安平樹屋 Anping Tree House
properties.description: Posted by Mort 安平樹屋 This house was a warehouse before.Full with the tree becomes an interesting place now

properties.name: 彰化武德殿
properties.description: Posted by Mort彰化武德殿

properties.name: 彰化銀宮戲院 Old theater
properties.description: Posted by Mort  彰化銀宮戲院，位於孔廟對面日治時期建築，是ART DECO風格建築[二、三○年代電影院建築正是ART DECO風格建築最典型作品]，現在是一間NET。 Here was a theater before.

properties.name: 影劇三村 Military Housing
properties.description: Posted by Mort 這裡有很多的貓咪

properties.name: 成大博物館 NCKU Museum
properties.description: Posted by Mort

properties.name: 撫台街洋樓 Beautiful house
properties.description: Posted by Mort

properties.name: 新化老街和市役場  Sinhua Jhongjheng Rd.
properties.description: Posted by Mort新化老街,市役場現在開了水灣餐廳 There are a lot of ancient old and beautiful houses here. The beautiful big house in the photograph is a restaurant

properties.name: 新竹州圖書館 Library
properties.description: Posted by Mort 新竹州圖書館 Library 圖書館前身是「新竹街圖書館」，為了紀念1923年日本大正天皇東宮太子裕仁訪問新竹而籌款興建， 1925年完成，改為「新竹州立圖書館」

properties.name: 新竹州廳 新竹市政府 Hsinchu City Government
properties.description: Posted by Mort1925年興建，二層樓、ㄇ字形平面的加強磚造建築物，和洋混合風格建築。

properties.name: 新竹市役所
properties.description: Posted by Mort市役所是一棟二層樓的磚造建築，現已整修完成

properties.name: 新竹影像博物館 Image museum
properties.description: Posted by Mort  開放時間：週三至週日 09:30-12:00 13:30-17:00 18:30-21:00 日據時代稱「新竹市營有樂館」，於 1933 年開幕啟用，是全台灣第一座擁有冷氣設備的戲院，光復後更改名為「國民大戲院」

properties.name: 新竹火車站 Hsinchu Train Station
properties.description: Posted by Sophiepa新竹火車站 Hsinchu Train Station新竹火車站前中華路與林森路交叉口上

properties.name: 東興洋行 Old Julius Mannich Merchant House
properties.description: Posted by Mort  最近開了餐廳有賣德國豬腳/香腸/黑啤酒和下午茶 Opened a restaurant recently here.And provide meals such as a German sausage/black beer and afternoon tea etc.

properties.name: 林柳新紀念偶戲博物館 Lin Liu-Hsin Puppet Theatre Museum
properties.description: Posted by Mort  博物館本身是在一棟漂亮的舊房子裡，有很多puppet。 是一個有趣的博物館，可以看見美好的東方文化。 地址：台北市西寧北路79號 The museum is in a beautiful old house, there are a lot of puppets. It is an interesting museum, can see fine oriental culture here. http://www.taipeipuppet.com/index-menu.html

properties.name: 楠梓煉油廠宿舍 Refinery dormitory
properties.description: Posted by Mort 宿舍的範圍很大片，不只一區(標示地點只是其中一個入口) 白色巨塔 五月天知足MV有到這裡拍。 Here is a very attractive dormitory area. Has many trees and the flower.

properties.name: 樂生療養院 Losheng Sanatorium
properties.description: Posted by Mort 樂生療養院是收容漢生病患的醫療院所 有六十多棟院舍，仍保有日治時代的建築特色，由於台北捷運新莊線興建機廠面臨到拆遷的爭議。 Here is a hospital that cures the Hansen\'s Disease. The hospital still keeps ancient appearance.

properties.name: 橋頭糖廠 Sugar industry museum
properties.description: Posted by Mort  橋頭糖廠(台灣糖業博物館)殖民樣式的建築、五分車還有賣冰棒跟冰淇淋。 這裡有很多樹和花所以可以看到蝴蝶自由的在飛。 This place is the Taiwan first new style mechanical system sugar factory. Now has the production popsicle and the ice cream.

properties.name: 橋頭車站 Ciaotou station
properties.description: Posted by Mort

properties.name: 水交社宿舍群 [志開新村] Military Housing
properties.description: Posted by Mort 很大片的眷村，努努的爺爺以前在這裡住過 牆上還有三名主義統一中國的標語， 一些電影和大愛的戲在這裡拍過，這裡以後會被保留下來。

properties.name: 消防博物館 Fire Department Museum
properties.description: Posted by Mort  消防博物館 Fire Department Museum

properties.name: 玉珍齋鹿港老舖 Yu Chen Chai
properties.description: Posted by Mort玉珍齋鹿港老舖

properties.name: 福興穀倉 Fusing Granary
properties.description: Posted by Mort2005/10/25「福興穀倉修復案」獲得肯定，並獲選為2005年的台灣建築獎首獎。 [附近的鹿港國中以前是鹿港神社]

properties.name: 空軍十一村 湖畔料亭 Old restaurant
properties.description: Posted by Mort 湖畔料亭是日治時代日本人接待高級官員、富商的宴飲場所，在當時是一處相當高級的社交場所。1950年之後，用來安置單身飛行員，成為空軍眷村，並更名為「空軍十一村」。 This building once was a Japanese cuisine store.

properties.name: 舊警察廳 Old Police Station
properties.description: Posted by Mort只剩玄關的舊警察廳,如果能留下來或是修復局部應該很不錯 Here have been a Police Station. However there only leave the part now.

properties.name: 西門國小鄉土文化館 Old house
properties.description: Posted by Mort西門國小日治時代之校長宿舍

properties.name: 運河博物館 Canal Museum
properties.description: Posted by Mort  運河博物館的建築在以前屬於海關，日治時期時商船都要由此入關，當時是很繁榮熱鬧的地方，國民政府接收台灣後成為財政部高雄關台南支關，在民國74年海關遷到新港區後，這個地方就荒廢了，近幾年重新整修後成為運河博物館。 The building was a maritime customs now have already reserved to become canal museum.

properties.name: 阿蓮農會倉庫 Warehouse
properties.description: Posted by Mort

properties.name: 陳德聚堂 Chendejyu Hall
properties.description: Posted by Mort

properties.name: 高雄大舞台戲院 Old theater
properties.description: Posted by Mort  光復後民國36年由澎湖籍建築師蕭佛助起造，開幕後以演歌仔戲為主。民國39年專門放映電影，機器是使用美國製的放映機，生意很好。民國42年由日本進口新式放映機，專門放映洋片。民國88年3月1日停業是當年高雄市黃金戲院。 Here is am Kaohsiung well-known theater before. Closed up shop in 1999.

properties.name: 高雄歷史博物館 Kaohsiung Museum of History
properties.description: Posted by Mort  曾經是高雄市役所，舊高雄市政府，1939年落成屬於帝冠式風格的鋼筋混泥土建築 Here was the city hall in Kaohsiung before. This building becomes National Museum of History now

properties.name: 鳳山舊城北門 Northt-Gate
properties.description: Posted by Mort  鳳山舊城北門 Northt-Gate

properties.name: 鳳山舊城南門 Southt-Gate
properties.description: Posted by Mort鳳山舊城南門 Southt-Gate

properties.name: 鳳山舊城東門 East-Gate
properties.description: Posted by Mort  鳳山舊城東門 East-Gate
